backend/main.mo: Returns static site info including name and tagline.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries with associated pages, components, and requirements.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides prewritten summaries of major frontend files and pages for reference.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind layers and OKLCH-based theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that mounts the React app and loads main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures routes with TanStack Router and wraps the app in ThemeProvider.
frontend/src/components/SiteFooter.tsx: Footer component showing branding, links, and attribution using site info.
frontend/src/components/SiteLayout.tsx: Layout wrapper combining navbar, routed content, and footer within a theme provider.
frontend/src/components/SiteNavbar.tsx: Responsive navbar with navigation links, theme toggle, and theme-color selector.
frontend/src/components/ThemeColorProvid: Context provider exposing theme color presets and change handler.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and manages the authenticated or anonymous backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, including loading, login, logout, and status handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file reserved for future React Query hooks; currently empty.
frontend/src/hooks/useSiteInfo.ts: Fetches site info via React Query with a fallback when the backend actor is unavailable.
frontend/src/hooks/useThemeColor.ts: Manages theme color presets, syncing selection with localStorage and applying CSS variables based on light/dark mode.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers and CSS variables for light and dark themes, including color tokens and layout styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/About.tsx: Renders the About page with a hero section, story content, and values displayed in cards.
frontend/src/pages/Booking.tsx: Implements a booking form page with prefilled query params, form state handling, and a confirmation message after submission.
frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx: Renders the homepage with a hero section, about section, and a contact form with state handling for submissions.
frontend/src/pages/HoneymoonOffers.tsx: Displays a list of predefined honeymoon travel packages with images, details, and a hero section.
frontend/src/pages/Privacy.tsx: Shows the site's privacy policy broken into sections using card components.
frontend/src/pages/Services.tsx: Provides a hero section and grid of service cards describing various travel-related offerings.
frontend/src/pages/TourGuide.tsx: Presents information about the companyâ€™s tour guides, including benefits and feature highlights with supporting images.
frontend/src/pages/TourPackages.tsx: Renders a tour packages page showing multiple travel packages with details, images, and a hero section.
frontend/src/pages/Vehicles.tsx: Displays a fleet of vehicles with capacities, features, pricing, and supporting hero/section layouts.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS with custom colors, fonts, animations, and content paths.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, feature requirements, image specifications, and architectural notes.
